mapper.select: select no, name, to_char(birth_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as birthDate, phone, employee_no as employeeNo, comments, grade, post, address, to_char(reg_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate from customer
mapper.update:
update customer
name=#{name},
birth_date=#{birthDate},
phone=#{phone},
employee_no=#{employeeNo},
comments=#{comments},
grade=#{grade},
post=#{post},
address=#{address},
reg_date=#{regDate}
where no=#{no}
